KeenBench - Weekly Ops Notes (Fictional QA Data)
Week of 2026-02-10

Updates
- Engineering: context processing flow is stable in most runs; occasionally retries are needed.
- Sales/Growth: 2 design partners are active; 1 more in pipeline.
- Ops: tighten egress-consent messaging to reduce surprises for first-time users.

Open questions
- What is the shortest onboarding path that still teaches Draft -> Review -> Publish?
- Which document style rules should be defaults vs user-provided context?
